title: Ginger Superheroes: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
itunes:title: Ginger Superheroes: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode (RE-RELEASE)
description:
This is a RE-RELEASE, the first Mothaf*ckin Mini Episode! Want your conspiracy theories your family has told you mentioned on the podcast? Send us your voice memos and emails to mymommapod@gmail.com

Langston answers a listener's conspiracy theory about Hollywood replacing its redheaded characters with Black actors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
